code: import axios from'axios';import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CoinBalance(){const[balance,setBalance]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('/User/CoinAmount',{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}}).then(response=>setBalance(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error(error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Coin Balance"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:balance})]});}export default CoinBalance;
